title: Riot knows not the difference between Sexual and Sexy
body:
{{champion:28}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:1}}  

"ok enough Foreplay" what else could that stand for? 

The Ev voice-line is totally inappropriate.    Yes it is hilarious, but not for this game.  While there is lots of cheese and suggestive content already, this is explicit and there is no doubt about it.  Want to make her a whore? , Fine but she is supposed to be mature and classy, not some high schooler going out on Halloween every day. 

I play league in a room dedicated to gaming with my twin brother (born gaming sis-bro!), so countless times when I'm always using my speakers to get the best experience, our younger sister always regurgitates Annie and Lissandra's voice and laugh, respectively.    When I would go on an Evelynn grind,  my mother would pass by saying "that character is crazy sounding, but scary in a way".   Then the annoying habit came that weekend when she would repeat   "the dike is my veil" ..... can you imagine what she'd take from the current vx on the PBE?  Oh my I don't even want to think about it. 

So, as I am a 27- yrs old lady here - i K Now  what it is to have countless games feature seductive female characters.  I just wish Ev isn't the next one on the list and they fix her.  You all have to be even before you can release something like this?  No, Taric isn't the equivalent to a whore.  As flamboyant as you want him, he is still decent.    Where is the skinny guy with the big package and g-string in this game?  That's what I thought.   I don't see male characters being objectified in this game as they should if you wanna keep doing this to classic champions like Evelynn.   (no Rakán, Ahri talking about you doesn't make you an object) .  

Please save this for another lady of pleasure champion.  Evelynn is supposed to be seductive, not "let him have everything there and then".  That's not how seduction work, it's more of a loose tug of war. How can she so revealing....... when she is a concealing assassin?  LIke wtf. ^____^   Oh and the reason for the rework was so that she did not tower dive so easily and survive by bursting under tower then simply walking away--- did the developers forget because now she is definitely going for that play style specifically with this kit.    Btw, her walking is supposed to be front-forward like the classic Ev, not immature Miss Fortune or Start Guardian Ahri where is seems something is stuck up there. 

Thanks for the love and I'd like to hear all of y'all's  thoughts <3.      

P.S.  Anyone else have a sibling that mimics Annie!?

replies.body:
But ($$) it ($) fits ($$$) the ($$) theme! ($$$$)

Who do you think this is marketed to?
People who can learn to live a little and stop crying or outraging about every fucking thing on this damn planet.

DR DELICIOUS:"I made an insult on the internet!"
MRS. WYATT-DELUSIONAL:"Yes, honey, you did." 
||Un-cocks gun and settles it back in the drawer.||
*Maybe another day...*
DR DEFICIENT:"HEHEHEHEHE, TAKE THAT YOU LOSER"
MRS. WYATT-DELUSIONAL:"But not this day..."
||Closes drawer and lies back down.||
THANK YOU

I kind of agree that some of her lines are over the top, especially "It's so...big" and a few others. But I'm mainly disappointed by "It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels" not being in there, while some others are. "The dark is my veil" is a worthy line to keep, but one of the others they kept was rather generic.

I thought at one point, one of the Rioter mentioned the quote "It takes a lot of effort to move like this in heels" was kept in this new rework. I haven't had the patience to listen to all her quotes, but it's not there? Now that's disappointing....
What got me rolling was when she was buying a Void Staff, she said, "Wonder what places this can go".
I personally think rito has been trying a bit too hard with recent VOs like Rakan/Xayah and Eve's.
What makes Annie dirty? o.O

> [{quoted}](name=Suitaro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XQoUpaqn,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2017-10-01T00:12:54.946+0000)
>

"have you seen my bare tibbers?"
Lol I thought it was: Have you seen my bear, Tibbers xD

> [{quoted}](name=Suitaro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XQoUpaqn,comment-id=001000000000,timestamp=2017-10-01T10:34:27.286+0000)
>
> Lol I thought it was: Have you seen my bear, Tibbers xD

Well, I mean, officially it is "bear" just like how officially BF Sword stands for Best Friend Sword or maybe Big Friggin Sword. But we all know what it really stands for. And you know... back in the day so much shit was lowkey crude humor. What do you think Kog'Maw's name alludes to? Look at his mouth.

>**Btw, her walking is supposed to be front-forward like the classic Ev, not immature Miss Fortune or Start Guardian Ahri where is seems something is stuck up there.**

This is why In-game MF needs to get updated with a new VO {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Awwww!!!! You are fraternal twin players just like my little sibblings.  Except, they play playstation 4.  Love it. {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

You need to be way more concise with your points and additionally provide some examples from both new and old eve to demonstrate it.

Your argument is:  New Eves voice lines are less subtle and thus too slutty.  She should retain voice lines from old eve that keep her essence as a seductress.

Find voice lines from new eve to prove your point, give suggestions for revamped ones that make it more "seductive" and provide voice lines from old eve to show what levels of "seductive" you are talking about.

The clothing argument is moot because old eve was just as skimpily dressed.  

The younger sibling/mother argument is moot because its rated T for teens and Riot really couldn't care less about your sister/mother hearing their voice lines (Maybe wear headphones?)

The gameplay problem you have:

> Oh and the reason for the rework was so that she did not tower dive so easily and survive by bursting under tower then simply walking away--- did the developers forget because now she is definitely going for that play style specifically with this kit.

is just straight up wrong.  She did not tower dive easily.  She is be able to tower dive decently (like most junglers) but her health pool is low (harder to tank) and doesn't have very good abilities for diving that champs like gragas, elise, kayne, zac, kindred etc. all have.

Eve is being reworked because her kit is outdated as fuck and frustrating to play against due to her stealth mechanic.  Riots answer to fixing this is giving her cc (with counterplay), a gap closer, an escape tied to her ulti and removed her stealth pre 6. 

I suggest making a new thread, focus on one single point (the fact that you think she is slut instead of seductive) and argue that one.

Hey man, how about you take a chill pill?  Riot already made a post regarding community members like you go reread it.  They don't want people verifying and rebutting things just for the sake of showing argumentation skills.   Riot wants to hear what people think and their opinions.  People will less likely share how they feel if they feel they have the write an essay to prove a point and exhibit evidence to people like you that can't give credit without having a police report brought to them or a thesis written about simple opinions.   

Btw she is write in saying the original purpose of the rework was so that she wasn't a tower diver.    The precisely reworked her because she was going tanky and just W-ing away from the turret after finishing an assassination as a tank. 

Please learn to crit and concede, not just crit & crit.  GG.

Alrighty lets try this again.

In order to discuss the points in the post and give my opinion on the topic i require a couple of things.

Knowledge of the new Eves voice lines.
Knowledge of the old Eves voice lines.  

No examples of either of these are provided anywhere in the post. How is someone coming from the boards supposed to give their opinion on them if they don't know or are only vaguely familiar with them?

Eve quotes are all non-explicite except the "i prefer to go naked but i'm fine" that should be straight up removed

every single one of them, if a kid asks you what she says, you can answer to the question without explaining something sexual

Have you heard her interactions with voidstaff? "it's so...big" thats a legit penis indication, not just a joke, but a complete frontal indication of one. 

Then there are very suggestive taunts like "i can make you do much more than just jingle, space man" to bard. 

Evelynn was meant to be a classy dark and slow-mo sadistic kinda creature, not this sex on the beach ripoff that has the crappy ending of 50 shades thrown into the mix

Bevor her rework she was like that now she is still sardistic and dark but she also baits her victims  with acting like she does now.
btw she never even has sex

You need to consider what people think when they don't know the lore, and don't play the game.

What are those people going to think about her quotes?
Thei will judge it like a normal human and that is wrong?I mean we have killing machines Monsters and sereal Killers in the game nothing wrong with that?

Your previous statement was based on people knowing her lore Before they made judgement on her quotes.

I'm just pointing out that you can't make that assumption.
what do you mean?

if my 10 yo brother asks me what she means i will just answer him by "she thinks void staff is big" and he will understand that quickly as he learns english with school

This is something I wished more people understood: not every champion is meant to be mained by every player.  IMO it's perfectly fine if there are champs that you'll either love or hate for its themes.  A polarizing design can be a good one.

There is much objectivity in what is objectifying and what isn't. One could argue that many things have been objectified if you want to go down that road. Blacks, Whites, Males, Females, Turtles, Bears, Trees, and the list can go on and on. All of these things are literally called, "Objects" when programming.

In other words, your argument is terrible since EVERYTHING is actually objectified. Thank god people are finally waking up to how toxic this social justice movement is. See you in a few years when you have learned the error of your ways. :-)
what morality ?

You are delusional.   She's right about objectifying a male character.  And you can't argue that.     See you in a few minutes when you have learned the error of not seeing the point she was making with Taric. {{champion:44}}

"She is right about objectifying a male character."

Yeah, she is right TO YOU. You must of missed something also since I claimed that every character in the game is objectified. Which is a fact.
It sounds more like something you would see in cartoons where adults *get* the sexual joke, but kids would just stare at it and going like "huh?"
Never forget the condom from the Power Puff Girls.
"Yeah I'm created by accident too."
It would be nice if I could agree with that statement.

Am I just uniformed?
